author: Frank Herbert
quote: Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: He who controls the spice controls the universe.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The mystery of life isn't a problem to solve, but a reality to experience.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The first step in avoiding a trap is knowing of its existence.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The power to destroy a thing is the absolute control over it.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: There is no escapeâ€”we pay for the violence of our ancestors.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The slow blade penetrates the shield.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: A world is supported by four things... the learning of the wise, the justice of the great, the prayers of the righteous, and the valor of the brave.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The most persistent principles of the universe are accident and error.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The future is a moving target, one we can only try to predict.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: A man is a man because he is able to question, and a woman is a woman because she is able to answer.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The path to enlightenment is fraught with peril, but it is the only path worth taking.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: In the face of great danger, even the smallest of actions becomes a question of survival.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Religion is the opium of the masses, but it can also be the light that guides us.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The human spirit is capable of great resilience, and we should never underestimate its strength.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the ability to act in spite of it.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The power of the spice is that it connects people to the very core of the universe.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The answer to any problem is always patience and careful thought.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: A people that cannot protect its own will soon find itself enslaved.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: You cannot defeat a man who has nothing left to lose.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The test of a great leader is not how well they lead in times of peace, but how well they manage in times of crisis.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Those who dream of changing the world must first understand it.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Without change, there is no evolution, and without evolution, there is no future.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Power is not something that is granted, it is something that is earned.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Only those who face fear head-on can truly conquer it.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The human mind is the most complex of all creatures, and the most vulnerable.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Life's mysteries are often more profound than we can ever understand.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: The greatest danger is in underestimating the strength of our adversaries.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Each new generation is a new experiment in survival.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Society's failures are rooted in its inability to embrace the unknown.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: Through every tragedy, humanity finds new ways to survive and grow stronger.
